title: core
text:
Blurring faces in a video

model = obj_model()
v = mp.VideoFileClip('../videos/coffee.mp4')
v2 = blur_faces_video(model, v, conf=0.3, h_factor=0.6, kernel=75, step=5)
v2.ipython_display()
